update base_flow_taskinstance
swimlane_id = #{swimlaneId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
processinstance_id = #{processinstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duedate = #{duedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_cancelled = #{isCancelled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_suspended = #{isSuspended,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_blocking = #{isBlocking,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update base_flow_taskinstance set swimlane_id = #{swimlaneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, processinstance_id = #{processinstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duedate = #{duedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_cancelled = #{isCancelled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_suspended = #{isSuspended,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_blocking = #{isBlocking,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from base_flow_taskinstance fti left join base_flow_swimlane_user fsu on fsu.swimlane_id = fti.swimlane_id left join base_user us on us.id = fsu.user_id where fti.processinstance_id = #{processinstanceId} and us.user_name = #{username}

select
from base_flow_taskinstance fti left join base_flow_task fta on fta.id = fti.task_id where fti.processinstance_id = #{processinstance_id} and fta.node_id = #{node_id}
